name: Inventory Restocking Expenses Tracker
description: Ideal for those who are looking to manage their business inventory restocking needs, this tracker helps you keep track of inventory restocking purchases, setting budget, assessing consumption and much more.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of inventory restocking expenses?This tracker is perfect to add inventory restocking details, add expenses, set consumption as well all under one glance.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, co
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
